Text: Thanks for the upload! I've made a request on the forum, but I thought I would make it here too... I'm looking for Sanitarium for Mac OSX. I believe there are wineskins made for Ubuntu and so forth but I'm not technical enough to make all this work. Thanks!

Hi, thanks for all your work!
I have a request. Could you get the game motherload gold edition? thanks!
What about "Trainz Simulator" for Mountain Lion?
I have a request! Can u get Civilization V - Gold Edition the native Mac edition? All I have found are wineskin !!!

Thanks. A loooooong time ago I was really into train games but there was nothing for the Mac and looked with envy at the interesting-looking box of this game and the ability of the Windoze people to use it.
My interest on railroad games has been assuaged somewhat with time, but still this remains a very good game according to the knowledgeable and the experienced.
So thanks lots for allowing me to finally give it a go.
:)
ya an Civilization V - Gold Edition the native Mac edition would be awesome! thanks!!
